Recap: While Todd is alone in the cabin, he is once again "visited" by Irene who tells him that he must remembering going to Victor's home in the rain, finding Jack's keys which were lying on the ground, letting himself in and murdering Victor. We see that very event occurring and Todd being devastated to remember for the first time. He then realizes or wants to believe that it's only Irene haunting him and brainwashing him to believe that and it did not happen. But do we really know? It appears that neither Rex nor Shane are "viable" suspects. But Brody looks somewhat suspicious when Shaun and Vimal reminds John that the murder weapon is the same as what Brody uses and that Brody was overheard making a death threat to Victor. Rex tells Roxy that he supports Natalie moving on with Brody and getting over John. But she adamantly tells him that John is the man for his sister. In Kentucky, Cutter and Rama "help" each other by turning Kim in for drugging and killing the customer at The Spotted Pony. Meanwhile, the young woman known as Stacy who looks just like Gigi awakens. Yet we do not yet get to know who she really is or what she remembers.
Transcript: [Monitor beeping]
Rex: I mean, I still can't believe that's what it took for me to wake up -- seeing my son with a gun in his hand. I'm just glad Gigi didn't have to see it.
Natalie: I'm sorry, Rex.

Rex: No. I'm the one who's sorry. I mean, I filled myself up with so much grief, I left my son to fend for himself, and he couldn't and spiraled out of control. It's like the high school roof all over again.
Natalie: So from now on, you're gonna do things differently.
Rex: Well, from now on, Shane is my priority -- no excuses. I think that's what Gigi was telling me when she said, "Don't give up" -- don't give up on our son.
[SCENE_BREAK]
[Monitor beeping]
Stacy: [Gasps] Rex.

Kim: What are you doing here?
Rama: Oh, I'm here to settle an old score.
Kim: We haven't seen each other in like a century. What old score could we settle?
Rama: I'm talking about my money, the money you stole from me.
Kim: Oh, right. The -- you mean the -- the cash I borrowed. Well, I was totally gonna pay you back. I-I --
Rama: Well, you had a century to pay me back, and you haven't done it. No! You used it to buy new everything.
Kim: [Clears throat]
Rama: You thought you were safe 'cause I wouldn't recognize you. Well, guess what. You're not safe, Aubrey.
Kim: Kim.
Rama: Whatever the hell you're calling yourself now. You're not safe from me, 'cause I'm here to collect, with interest.

Téa: Todd is willing to turn himself in, but we're gonna need something in return.
Bo: [Laughing] Oh. Well, that's pushing it, Téa. I mean, even for you.
Téa: I'm simply giving my client the best representation I can.
Bo: But you're dictating terms, and your client's negotiating position -- it's pretty much nonexistent.
Téa: You haven't heard our request. I think it's pretty reasonable, given the circumstances surrounding the investigation.
Bo: All right. Let's hear it.
Téa: The murder charge.
Bo: Victor's?
Téa: Todd will come in once it's dropped.

Shaun: L.T. Just the man I'm looking for.

Shaun: The kind you should hear before anybody else does.

Todd: So, who killed you, brother of mine? We're twins, right? Aren't we supposed to have some kind of a spooky connection?
[Wood creaks]

Irene: Guess again.
Todd: No.
Irene: Don't be so negative, son. I know you've missed me.

Téa: The murder charge doesn't hold anymore, Commissioner.

Bo: Yeah, but just because Jack didn't see anything, that doesn't mean that Todd didn't shoot Victor. He had a motive. And we have a recording on Shaun Evans' phone. And it was made just before Victor was shot, and it might be the proof that Todd was the one that killed him. So I think you're being a little bit premature, Téa. What?

Bo: Yeah.
Téa: I need to hear it.

Shaun: Guess I shouldn't be surprised. Damn, I hate the fact that kid played me out like that.
John: Yeah, I just hate that kid, but, hey, look, maybe you'll make up for it, right? You know, with the information you're gonna tell me. Have a seat.
Shaun: Well, I can't guarantee it's gonna lead anywhere. I don't know the guy that well.

Shaun: I ran into Vimal Patel at Capricorn last night. I got a feeling he might know something.

Shaun: Well, we started talking about the murder. Then he said he thought a cop might have done it.
John: An LPD cop?
Shaun: He was a little freaked out, man.
John: Did he tell you why he thought the shooter was a cop?

Stacy: Rex... don't... give up.

Cutter: I -- sorry. I don't know anything about that. I'm...just here to do my civic duty!

Rex: Like a release form.

Rex: Uh, because they're engaged.

Irene: You were listening for Victor's voice. Then you heard it. Your heart began to pound. You knew he was inside. You knew you had him.
Todd: I don't know where you're getting all this. None of this happened -- n-none of it. None of it.
Irene: You had the gun in your hand. It was heavy, wasn't it? You tried the door, but it was locked. How did you get in?

John: I'm doing you a favor, Brody.

Irene: Don't stop now. You can see it. You're almost there.

Natalie: Brody, you don't have to say anything.
Brody: It's okay. I told him if he did anything to hurt me or my family, I'd kill him.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Todd: I didn't kill my brother. You know, you... you -- you kill your brother, that's something you remember, right? How could I block something like that out?
Irene: Force of habit. Eight years in captivity taught you to bury the parts of yourself that you didn't like. But I know the real you.
Todd: No, you don't. You don't know me. You don't know me. You don't know anything about me.
Irene: I know you are the son of Victor Lord. Don't you forget it... because nobody else will.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nate: So, what do you say? Huh? Give me another shot. Please?
Danielle: I can't be your girlfriend. Not without... going on a date first. L-listen to me. I'm willing to take this slow... and see what happens, okay?
Nate: Dani, that's... slow.
Danielle: Yeah.
Nate: Slow's good.
Danielle: Right.
Nate: [Chuckles] So, uh... until next time?
Danielle: Next time. [Sighs]
[SCENE_BREAK]
Cutter: [Sighs] All right... I'll check on her, just this once.
[Monitor beeping]
Doctor: Lie still, please. Lie still.
Cutter: Wait. W-what happened? She woke up?
Nurse: Yes, but she's still a little confused.
Doctor: Do you know who the president is? How about your name? Can you tell me your name?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Roxanne: Let go of me. Your sister needs to know that John loves her.
Rex: Don't you think he should be the one to say that?
Roxanne: He can't!
Rex: Why the hell not?
Roxanne: He can't! It's his pride!
Rex: Oh, well... then I think she's better off without him. She's got a good guy, Rox. He makes her happy. They're starting a family together.
Roxanne: Brody is not the one.
Rex: He could be... if she gives him half a chance, and that's what she wants to do.
Roxanne: How do you know?
Rex: She told me. She's moving on, Rox. Just like me. I'm letting go of Gigi -- she's letting go of John. Now, let her do this, Rox, okay? Let her be happy.
[SCENE_BREAK]
John: Well, I can see how you'd find that irrelevant. You know, Brody, you don't usually threaten to kill a man without provocation. So what did Victor do? How'd he threaten to hurt your family?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Téa: I have great news. Todd? Todd! Todd?
